title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: This course introduces the fundamental concepts of computer science, including programming, data structures, and algorithms.

title: Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
description: This course teaches you how to build websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Data Science with Python
description: This course teaches you how to collect, clean, and analyze data using Python.

title: Machine Learning with TensorFlow
description: This course teaches you how to build machine learning models using TensorFlow.

title: Digital Marketing for Beginners
description: This course teaches you the basics of digital marketing, including SEO, PPC, and social media marketing.
